 18 /**
 19  * Takes a solr field that stores an ISO-3166 country code. It creates facet values and
 20  * displays them in a selection dropdown as well as on a google chart map item. 
 21  * 
 22  * @class CountryCodeWidget
 23  * @augments jQuery.solrjs.AbstractClientSideWidget
 24  */
 25 jQuery.solrjs.CountryCodeWidget = jQuery.solrjs.createClass ("AbstractClientSideWidget", { 
 26 
 27   /** 
 28    * The width of the map images.
 29    * 
 30    * @field 
 31    * @public
 32    */
 33   width : 350, 
 34   
 35   /** 
 36    * The height of the map images.
 37    *
 38    * @field 
 39    * @public
 40    */
 41   height : 180, 
 42 
 43   /** 
 44    * The field name of the iso country code field.
 45    *
 46    * @field 
 47    * @public
 48    */
 49   fieldName : "",  
 50   
 51   getSolrUrl : function(start) { 
 52 		return "&facet=true&facet.mincount=1&facet.limit=-1&facet.field=" + this.fieldName;
 53   },
 54 
 55   handleResult : function(data) { 
 56 	  jQuery(this.target).empty();
 57 	  
 58 	  // get facet counts
 59 	  var values = data.facet_counts.facet_fields[this.fieldName];  
 60 	  var maxCount = 0;
 61     var objectedItems = [];
 62     for (var i = 0; i < values.length; i = i + 2) {
 63       var c = parseInt(values[i+1]);
 64       if (c > maxCount) {
 65         maxCount = c;
 66       }
 67       objectedItems.push({label:values[i], count:values[i+1]});
 68     }
 69     
 70     // create a select for regions
 71     var container = jQuery("<div/>").attr("id",  "solrjs_" + this.id).appendTo(this.target);
 72     var select = jQuery("<select/>").appendTo(container);
 73     var me = this;
 74     select.change(function () {
 75       jQuery("#solrjs_" + me.id + " img").each(function (i,item) {
 76             jQuery(item).css("display", "none");
 77           });
 78       jQuery("#solrjs_" + me.id + this[this.selectedIndex].value).css("display", "block");
 79     });
 80     jQuery("<option/>").html("view the World ").attr("value", "world").appendTo(select);
 81     jQuery("<option/>").html("view Africa").attr("value", "africa").appendTo(select);
 82     jQuery("<option/>").html("view Asia").attr("value", "asia").appendTo(select);
 83     jQuery("<option/>").html("view Europe").attr("value", "europe").appendTo(select);
 84     jQuery("<option/>").html("view the Middle East").attr("value", "middle_east").appendTo(select);
 85     jQuery("<option/>").html("view South America").attr("value", "south_america").appendTo(select);
 86     jQuery("<option/>").html("view North America").attr("value", "usa").appendTo(select);
 87     
 88     // create a select for facet values
 89 	  var codes = "";
 90 	  var mapvalues = "t:";
 91 	  var countrySelect = jQuery("<select/>").appendTo(container);
 92 	  countrySelect.change(function () {
 93       var items =  [new jQuery.solrjs.QueryItem({field: me.fieldName , value:this[this.selectedIndex].value})];
 94       solrjsManager.selectItems(me.id, items);
 95     });
 96 	  jQuery("<option/>").html("--select--").attr("value", "-1").appendTo(countrySelect);;
 97     
 98     // create map data
 99     for (var i = 0; i < objectedItems.length; i++) {
100       if (objectedItems[i].label.length != 2) {
101         continue;
102       }
103       codes += objectedItems[i].label;
104       var currentValue = objectedItems[i].count;
105       var percent =  (objectedItems[i].count / maxCount);
106       var tagvalue = parseInt(percent * 100);       
107       mapvalues += tagvalue + ".0";
108       if (i < objectedItems.length - 1) {
109         mapvalues += ",";
110       }
111       jQuery("<option/>").html(objectedItems[i].label + " (" + currentValue + ")").attr("value", objectedItems[i].label).appendTo(countrySelect);
112     }
113     
114     // show maps
115 	  jQuery("<img/>").attr("id", "solrjs_" + this.id + "africa").css("display", "none").attr("src","http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chco=f5f5f5,edf0d4,6c9642,365e24,13390a&chd=" + mapvalues + "&chf=bg,s,eaf7fe&chtm=africa&chld="+ codes +"&chs="+this.width+"x"+this.height+"&cht=t").appendTo(container);
116 	  jQuery("<img/>").attr("id", "solrjs_" + this.id + "asia").css("display", "none").attr("src","http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chco=f5f5f5,edf0d4,6c9642,365e24,13390a&chd=" + mapvalues + "&chf=bg,s,eaf7fe&chtm=asia&chld="+ codes +"&chs="+this.width+"x"+this.height+"&cht=t").appendTo(container);
117 	  jQuery("<img/>").attr("id", "solrjs_" + this.id + "europe").css("display", "none").attr("src","http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chco=f5f5f5,edf0d4,6c9642,365e24,13390a&chd=" + mapvalues + "&chf=bg,s,eaf7fe&chtm=europe&chld="+ codes +"&chs="+this.width+"x"+this.height+"&cht=t").appendTo(container);
118 	  jQuery("<img/>").attr("id", "solrjs_" + this.id + "middle_east").css("display", "none").attr("src","http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chco=f5f5f5,edf0d4,6c9642,365e24,13390a&chd=" + mapvalues + "&chf=bg,s,eaf7fe&chtm=middle_east&chld="+ codes +"&chs="+this.width+"x"+this.height+"&cht=t").appendTo(container);
119 	  jQuery("<img/>").attr("id", "solrjs_" + this.id + "south_america").css("display", "none").attr("src","http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chco=f5f5f5,edf0d4,6c9642,365e24,13390a&chd=" + mapvalues + "&chf=bg,s,eaf7fe&chtm=south_america&chld="+ codes +"&chs="+this.width+"x"+this.height+"&cht=t").appendTo(container);
120 	  jQuery("<img/>").attr("id", "solrjs_" + this.id + "usa").css("display", "none").attr("src","http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chco=f5f5f5,edf0d4,6c9642,365e24,13390a&chd=" + mapvalues + "&chf=bg,s,eaf7fe&chtm=usa&chld="+ codes +"&chs="+this.width+"x"+this.height+"&cht=t").appendTo(container);
121 	  jQuery("<img/>").attr("id", "solrjs_" + this.id + "world").css("display", "block").attr("src","http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chco=f5f5f5,edf0d4,6c9642,365e24,13390a&chd=" + mapvalues + "&chf=bg,s,eaf7fe&chtm=world&chld="+ codes +"&chs="+this.width+"x"+this.height+"&cht=t").appendTo(container);
122 	  
123 	  
124 	}
125 });
